config.inline.title: Inline
config.inline.extras.modicon.desc: Adds mod icons next to mod names in item tooltips, usually added by jei/emi
config.inline.extras.chatcap.desc: 1: [item:diamond_sword] 1.5: [item!diamond_sword] 2: [item+diamond_sword] Prevent large renders from blocking your chat
config.inline.extras.createinterop.desc: Allow inline renders to work on display boards.
